summary: This is a small texture replacer for the Waterfall LOD.
descriptionHtml:
[size=-1][b]Version:[/b] v1
[b]Date:[/b] 12/16/2012
[b]Author:[/b] lifestorock[/size]
[line]

[size=+1][color=A52A2A][b]Description:[/b][/color][/size]
This mod tries to improve the shiny bright waterfall LODs. I\'m sure you have noticed the drastic change of waterfalls when you reached the distant line. I tried to \"fix\" this by editing the textures which caused this effect. I\'m aware of the fact that hexaae released the mod [url=http://skyrim.nexusmods.com/mods/6161]Better distant LOD waterfalls[/url] that already does this. But I wasn\'t really satisfied with the result and created my own attempt. Take a look at the two comparison shots and decide for yourself which mod to use. It\'s just a matter of personal taste.


[size=+1][color=A52A2A][b]Install:[/b][/color][/size]
Extract the content of the archive into your Skyrim \"Data\" folder.


[size=+1][color=A52A2A][b]Uninstall:[/b][/color][/size]
Remove the following files:
Data\\textures\\terrain\\tamriel\\objects\\tamriel.objects.dds
Data\\textures\\terrain\\tamriel\\objects\\tamriel.objects_n.dds
[line]

[b]Permission Note:[/b]
You must contact me and obtain my permission before re-packaging any part of this mod. My mod also contains assets released by other authors (take a look at the Credits). Permission for using this files must be obtained separately from the original author of the assets you want to use.

[center][size=+1][color=#ff0000][b]Under all circumstances any upload or re-upload to any other download site than the ones provided as authorized mirrors is explicitly forbidden![/b][/color][/size][/center]
author: lifestorock
